meanings.definition: Mickler (noun): a small, insignificant person or thing
meanings.sent1: The tiny bug scurried away, a mickler in the vast garden.
meanings.sent2: The pebble was just a mickler among the rocks on the beach.
meanings.sent3: The mickler mouse thought it ruled the house, much to the cat's amusement.
meanings.sent4: In the grand forest, the mickler squirrel tried to stand out among the towering trees.
meanings.sent5: The mickler raindrop got lost in the downpour, unnoticed by all.

meanings.definition: Mickler (adjective): showing a lack of importance or significance
meanings.sent1: The mickler flower wilted in the shadow of the giant sunflower.
meanings.sent2: His mickler attempt to fix the broken toy went unnoticed by his friends.
meanings.sent3: The mickler party hat made everyone chuckle at the birthday celebration.
meanings.sent4: Her mickler voice was drowned out by the loud music at the concert.
meanings.sent5: The mickler star flickered weakly in the vast night sky.
